========
evALLIES
========

| **evALLIES** is an open source package for the Lifelong Speaker Diarization
| The aim of **evALLIES** is to provide a baseline system for the ALLIES evaluation 


:Authors: 
    Anthony Larcher
    Meysam Shamsi
    Yevhenii Prokopalo
          
:Version: 0.2.0 of 2021/01/23
